effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

short_effect.sun-moon: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
